description: Welcome to The Hamptons by Cressey — a perfect family-friendly townhome in central Richmond. This rare 4-bedroom end unit offers privacy and space, featuring a west-facing gated yard with a desirable entrance off Alberta St for easy access and extra street parking. The main floor boasts a spacious living and dining area with a balcony, plus a bright kitchen with its own eating nook and balcony. Upstairs includes 3 generous bedrooms and 2 full baths, while the ground floor offers a versatile bedroom or office that opens to a private patio and grassed yard. Complete with a 2-car tandem garage, this home is just steps to Henry Anderson Elementary, AR MacNeill Secondary, and Garden City Park — an ideal location for growing families.
